body_html: Thanks guys for the quick response, I wasn't expecting one for a while at least. Sorry if this sounds like a bi of a dumb question, how do I install this? do I simply pip install it? (if so, do I removed the previous tensorflow gpu? or does it do so automatically?) or does it require downloading it and manually installing it in some way? consider me a bit of a newbie.
